article.title: ERAPSCO to Provide Sonobuoys
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: ERAPSCO, Columbia City, Indiana, is being awarded a $25,392,401 firm-fixed-price contract for the procurement of 4,628 AN/SSQ-125 sonobuoys. The Naval Air Warfare Center Aircraft Division, Patuxent River, Maryland, is the contracting activity.
